data.lyric:
[ti:seven]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]seven - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.09]Written by：Taylor Swift/Aaron Dessner
[00:00.19]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), Ingrid Stella Music, administered by SonyATV Tunes LLC (ASCAP)
[00:00.28]All Rights Reserved. Used by Permission.
[00:00.34]Produced by：Aaron Dessner
[00:00.38]Recorded by：Jonathan Low and Aaron Dessner at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:00.51]Mixed by：Jonathan Low at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:00.61]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:00.71]Drum Programming, Percussion, Bass, Piano, Acoustic Guitar and Synthesizers by：Aaron Dessner (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:00.86]Orchestration by：Bryce Dessner (Biarritz, FR)
[00:00.92]Drum Programming by：Bryan Devendorf (Cincinnati, OH) recorded by Bryan Devendorf
[00:01.03]Viola and Violin by：Yuki Numata Resnick (Buffalo, NY) recorded by Kyle Resnick
[00:01.16]Cello by：Clarice Jensen (Brooklyn, NY) recorded by Clarice Jensen
[00:01.26]Drums by：JT Bates (Salon Studio; St. Paul, MN) recorded by JT Bates
[00:01.48]Please picture me in the trees
[00:07.99]I hit my peak at seven
[00:11.23]Feet in the swing over the creek
[00:17.98]I was too scared to jump in but I I was high
[00:25.71]In the sky
[00:28.01]With Pennsylvania under me
[00:33.46]
[00:35.40]Are there still beautiful things
[00:39.70]
[00:42.68]Sweet tea in the summer
[00:44.30]Cross your heart won't tell no other
[00:46.57]
[00:47.14]And though I can't recall your face
[00:49.50]I still got love for you
[00:51.93]
[00:52.50]Your braids like a pattern
[00:54.39]Love you to the moon and to Saturn
[00:57.07]Passed down like folk songs
[00:59.64]The love lasts so long
[01:04.86]
[01:23.13]And I've been meaning to tell you I think your house is haunted
[01:28.46]Your dad is always mad and that must be why
[01:33.10]And I think you should come live with me and we can be pirates
[01:38.33]Then you won't have to cry or hide in the closet
[01:43.99]And just like a folk song
[01:46.46]Our love will be passed on
[01:51.43]
[01:52.25]Please picture me in the weeds
[01:59.02]Before I learned civility I used to scream ferociously
[02:08.65]
[02:09.33]Any time I wanted
[02:12.27]
[02:23.88]Sweet tea in the summer
[02:25.17]Cross my heart won't tell no other
[02:28.16]And though I can't recall your face I still got love for you
[02:33.07]Pack your dolls and a sweater
[02:35.16]We'll move to India forever
[02:38.13]Passed down like folk songs
[02:40.60]Our love lasts so long
data.trans:
[ti:seven]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.09]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.28]//
[00:00.34]//
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.51]//
[00:00.61]//
[00:00.71]//
[00:00.86]//
[00:00.92]//
[00:01.03]//
[00:01.16]//
[00:01.26]//
[00:01.48]请想象我在大树上的模样
[00:07.99]七岁时 我就感觉自己身处巅峰
[00:11.23]在小河上方荡秋千
[00:17.98]我不敢跳进水里 但我
[00:25.71]可以翱翔天空
[00:28.01]俯瞰整个宾夕法尼亚
[00:35.40]现在那些美好还存在吗
[00:42.68]夏天喝着甜茶
[00:44.30]你发誓 不会告诉别人
[00:46.57]
[00:47.14]虽然我无法回忆起你的脸庞
[00:49.50]但我依然爱着你
[00:52.50]你的辫子我至今难忘
[00:54.39]我爱你到天荒地老 海枯石烂
[00:57.07]就像流芳百世的民谣
[00:59.64]这份爱天长地久
[01:04.86]
[01:23.13]我一直想告诉你 我觉得你家很可怕
[01:28.46]你爸爸总是怒火冲天 肯定这就是原因
[01:33.10]我觉得你应该来和我住 我们可以做海盗
[01:38.32]这样你就不用再哭泣 不用躲在柜子里
[01:43.99]就像一首民谣
[01:46.46]我们的爱会流芳百世
[01:52.25]请想象我在草丛中的模样
[01:59.02]在我懂得礼仪之前 我也喜欢大吼大叫
[02:09.33]过得随心所欲
[02:23.87]夏天喝着甜茶
[02:25.17]我发誓 不会告诉别人
[02:28.16]虽然我无法回忆起你的脸庞 但我依然爱着你
[02:33.07]收拾好你的洋娃娃和毛衣
[02:35.16]我们要搬去印度 再也不回来
[02:38.13]就像流芳百世的民谣
[02:40.60]我们的爱天长地久
